description.en: Gives +3 DEX when applied to a pierced weapon or shield.

description.br: Concede um aumento de +3 de Destreza quando aplicada em Arma ou Escudo perfurado.
description.cns: 敏捷+3(放置在武器或盾牌穿洞槽时)

description.fi: Gives +3 DEX when applied to a pierced weapon or shield.

description.fr: DEX augmentée de 3, en glissant la carte dans un emplacement percé de votre arme ou armure.
description.id: Memberi +3 DEX saat diterapkan pada senjata atau perisai yang ditembus.
description.it: Gives +3 DEX when applied to a pierced weapon or shield.
description.jp: 武器や盾に装着すると敏捷+3
